Documentation.content: Types for the Parallel Block Basic Linear Algebra Sub-programs support WARNING: attributes marked with WARNING can not be changed without making corresponding changes to the C++ attributes.
Internal Types for the Parallel Block Basic Linear Algebra Sub-programs support WARNING: attributes marked with WARNING can not be changed without making corresponding changes to the C++ attributes.

Definition.name: FromCells

Documentation.return: DATASET(Layout_Part) -- A dataset of partitions describing the same matrix(es) as the input cells.

param.name: cells
param.desc: A DATASET(Layout_Cell) containing the cells of the matrix

Documentation.content: Convert a matrix in cell-based form (i.e. DATASET(Layout_Cell)) to a partition-based form (i.e. DATASET(Layout_Part). Partition sizes will be automatically determined. See PBblas/Internal/MatDims. Note that the cell-based form may be sparse (i.e. contains only non-zero cells). The resulting partition-based matrix will contain zero in any cell not specified. Partitions will no non-zero cells will be omitted. This module supports the "myriad" style interface in that both dimension and matrix parameters may describe many separate matrices with different work item ids.

Signature.sign: DATASET(Layout_Part) FromCells(DATASET(Layout_Dims) dims, DATASET(Layout_Cell) cells, BOOLEAN transpose=FALSE)
Signature.name: FromCells

Definition.Signature: DATASET(Layout_Part) FromCells(DATASET(Layout_Dims) dims, DATASET(Layout_Cell) cells, BOOLEAN transpose=FALSE)

Documentation.content: Convert a matrix in Partition-based form (i.e. DATASET(Layout_Part)) to Cell-based form (i.e. DATASET(Layout_Cell)). Note that the returned cell-based matrix is sparse, in that it will only contain rows for cells that were non-zero in the original matrix. This interface supports "myriad" style, in that the partitions may represent many independent matrixes separated by different work item ids.

param.name: parts_recs
param.desc: A DATASET(Layout_Parts) specifying the matrix(es) to be converted

param.name: transpose
param.desc: BOOLEAN parameter causes each matrix to be transposed during conversion
